name: NRS Neoprene Pant - Youths
description: Coverage for youngsters who love to swim, surf, kayak or just play in the water. These stretchy neoprene pants add a bit of insulation so they can stay in longer.1mm neoprene with titanium laminate to reflect heat back to your body.Friction-free seams throughout for chafe-free wear.Body-mapped design allows comfortable range of motion.High-rise waist with drawstring adds warmth and coverage.
